mail_body:
Dear John Doe,

Thank you for choosing our relocation services! We're thrilled to assist you with your move to Austin.  Agent Sarah Miller will be your dedicated relocation specialist. 

We've already begun the process of finding suitable housing options for you.  We're focusing on furnished apartments in the downtown area, as per your preferences. We'll send you a selection of properties by the end of the week.  We anticipate having your initial property viewing scheduled for next Monday, October 29th, at 2:00 PM. 

In the meantime, please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions. We're here to make your relocation as smooth and stress-free as possible.

Sincerely,

Sarah Miller
Relocation Services
mail_summary: Confirmation email regarding relocation services to Austin, including property search and viewing schedule.
